name: Pickup Truck - Track Drive 2
description:
Pickup Truck - Track Drive 2 is ensures realistic car damage and accurate driving physics. A free app lets you drive an off-road vehicle and even drift. You will really feel like you are behind the wheel of a car.
Features:
- Realistic race, accelerate and brake controls
- Detailed Interior and exterior for realistic driving experience
- Steering Wheel, Buttons and Tilting control with clutch systems
- Fully modeled 3D environments and vehicles
- Detailed cargo trucks
- Challenging hill transport game missions
